description: This easy chicken tajine has the perfect mix of sweet and savoury flavours.
name: Chicken, Squash & Olive Tajine Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cups chicken stock (made with 1 stock cube)

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160Â°C. Heat half of the oil in a large, ovenproof casserole dish. Brown the chicken thighs on all sides, cooking for 2-3 minutes. Remove from the dish with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Heat the remaining oil and cook the onions for 5 minutes to soften, add the garlic and ginger and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in the garam masala and cinnamon and cook for 1 minute.

Tip the butternut squash and olives into the dish and stir well to coat with the spices. Place the chicken thighs back into the dish and pour over the chicken stock. Bring to a simmer then place in the oven, covered, for 40 minutes, until the chicken and squash are tender.
